Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.cb.backend.controller.AbstractCrudController<UserDto,Long>
com.cb.backend.controller.UserController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudController<UserDto,Long>
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/users") public class UserController extends AbstractCrudController<UserDto,Long>
REST controller for managing UserDto entities.

Provides standard CRUD endpoints inherited from AbstractCrudController:

  • GET /api/users – list all users,
  • GET /api/users/{id} – get a user by ID,
  • POST /api/users – create a new user,
  • PUT /api/users/{id} – update an existing user,
  • DELETE /api/users/{id} – delete a user by ID.

Provides an additional search endpoint:

  • GET /api/users/search?q={query} – search users by username containing the query string.

Delegates all operations to UserService.

  • Method Details

    • searchUsers

      @GetMapping("/search") public List<UserDto> searchUsers(@RequestParam("q") String query)
      Searches for users whose usernames contain the specified query string.
      Parameters:
      query - the search string to match against usernames
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto objects representing users that match the query
